channel.title: Black Holes on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Black Holes on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: New black hole merger bolsters Hawking area theorem
item.description: Physicists spliced merger’s gravitational signal into isolated frequencies to determine surface areas.

item.title: This Might Be the Most Massive Black Hole Ever Discovered
item.description: New measurements of the galaxy at the heart of the “Cosmic Horseshoe” indicate that it could house the most massive object ever seen in the universe.

item.title: This Might Be the Most Massive Black Hole Ever Discovered
item.description: New measurements of the galaxy at the heart of the “Cosmic Horseshoe” indicate that it could house the most massive object ever seen in the universe.

item.title: Newly Discovered ‘Infinity Galaxy’ Could Prove How Ancient Supermassive Black Holes Formed
item.description: This collision of two galaxies could demonstrate that theorized “direct collapse black holes” exist.

item.title: Newly Discovered ‘Infinity Galaxy’ Could Prove How Ancient Supermassive Black Holes Formed
item.description: This collision of two galaxies could demonstrate that theorized “direct collapse black holes” exist.

item.title: Merger of two massive black holes is one for the record books
item.description: The event resulted in a new black hole with a mass 225 times larger than our Sun.
